name: TMS
body:
TMS

A open source Talent Management System

GitHub Page:http://enixjin.github.io/TMS
Web application
Using following techonologies:
* AngularJS?
* Bootstrap
* Spring MVC 3.2.4.RELEASE
* Tiles 2.2
* mybatis 3.1.1
* ACTIVITI as workflow engine
* Mysql
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
